text: Pas, agar ruj ʙigardoned az icoʙat kardani da'vati haq ʙa rosti ki on ciro ki ʙo on ʙa sui sumo firistoda suda ʙudam ʙa sumo rasonidam va Parvardigori man mardumi digarero conisini sumo xohad gardonid, ki onho tavhidi Uro ʙa co orand va iʙodatasro ʙo ixlos ado namojand va ʙa saʙaʙi kufr va isjonaton hec ʙa u zijone namerasoned. Zero Parvardigori man nigahʙoni hamai cizhost
